settings.title: Alfa Laval SMP-BC Valve
settings.content:
The Alfa Laval SMP-BC Mixproof Valve is a hygienic, pneumatic double-seal valve specifically engineered to handle the simultaneous flow of two different products without any risk of cross-contamination. This top-loaded valve is both standardized and cost-effective, featuring quick leakage detection to ensure maximum product safety and minimal maintenance requirements due to its few moving parts. It is frequently employed in Cleaning-in-Place (CIP) lines and can be utilized in various systems handling different products.

  • Hygienic double-seal mixproof valve
  • Versatile, modular design meets most hygienic application
    requirements
  • Cost effective

Incorporating advanced features, the Alfa Laval SMP-BC Mixproof Valve is purpose-built for hygienic applications necessitating extra safety measures, leakage detection, and Cleaning-in-Place (CIP) procedures. It finds extensive utilization in diverse industries, including dairy, food and beverage, personal care, and various others
